topic.title: How do I mine namecoin?
topic.body:
Can people please post here on how and where people can mine namecoin. 

Go!

1_1BQg5MQZ63aEQZMzLEXP6yY3hsgznKpaps.body: Ubuntu 14.04 and on my mac. Screw wincurtains.

3_1LJMypJ67iEBwah82xwVVdB8SGZ1mwqgHQ.body: Only other host in in Denmark. Not sure if this is valid for your test, but hey. Moar txt for the zeronet,
